channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
1. How can i, on my website, make it so that you have to register an account before playing on my server??
2. How do i change the frame of runescape, so that your invintory and icons and stuff look like the current runescape?
3. How do i make the faded, welcome screen when you log onto the private server?
4. Does anyone out there have a Verizon wireless router? If so message me, im having trouble port-forwarding with it, and portforward.com doesnt know.
Thats all for now ;D
Im such a newbie :P
Appriciated! :)[br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2007, 10:59:01 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?
